    CTNote: CTN Outcomes, Treatments and Endpoints

    The goal of CTNote is to …do stuff (layla’s commit)

    Installation

    You can install the released version of CTNote from CRAN with:

    install.packages("CTNote")

    Example

    This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

    library(CTNote)
## basic example code
